content: papageno is the birdcatcher in the magic flute opera by wolfgang a mozart he has a playful somewhat stubborn childlike character that gives a lively touch to this eternal story of good and evil there s no difficulty finding the birdcatcher in these cheerful socks i once saw the pattern motif on a commercial sweater and adapted it for the smaller frame of these socks in case you are interested more magic flute patterns can be found here pamina 1 socks tamino 2 socks papagena 3 scarf sarastro 4 mittens 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pamina 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tamino 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/papagena 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sarastro
